body_html:
I second that, separable 3D convs are vital to export Xception type architectures to video and medical imaging. What bits of code would need to change to implement a native 3D version?

Are there any plans to create a nn_ops.depthwise_conv3d_native in the near future?

Thanks in advance!

body:
I second that, separable 3D convs are vital to export Xception type architectures to video and medical imaging. What bits of code would need to change to implement a native 3D version? 

Are there any plans to create a nn_ops.depthwise_conv3d_native in the near future?

Thanks in advance!
